revised_title: Francis Joseph Cole: A Pioneering Zoologist and Biologist
tldr: This article is a biography of Francis Joseph Cole, a prominent zoologist and biologist. It covers his early life, education, and career, highlighting his contributions to the fields of zoology and marine biology. Cole is known for his research on the nervous systems of Chimaera and Gadus, as well as his work with the Liverpool Marine Biological Association and his time at University College, Reading.
